products.title: Faux Suede, Aubergine - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede aubergine is the richest of colours and the most sumptuous of blinds. A heavy-looking, but lightweight to the touch, suede-feel fabric is home to a gorgeous plummy aubergine shade, deep and dazzling in its aesthetic. Use the aubergine to form a striking window feature in your country dining room, where it will bring contemporary chic to a traditional environment. Stick to cream walls and use plenty of dark woods in the room, choosing an equally modern silver to accent.

products.title: Faux Suede, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in charcoal offers a different take on jet black, providing a softer monochrome shade that is much less overpowering, whilst the touchable suede-feel fabric is warm and cosy, and barely distinguishable from the real thing. The subtle quality of the charcoal makes this roman blind the perfect hue for taming a brighter and bolder colour scheme. Use to break up a strong red and black dining room; a lime and neon teenager's bedroom; or a cobalt blue bathroom.

products.title: Faux Suede, Mocha - Roman Blind
products.description: Include dreamy texture and delicious tones in your home by incorporating the faux suede in mocha for a sophisticated look full of warming hues. The velvet-like cloth falls neatly and naturally to form an effortless roman blind with inviting comfort and appeasing colour. Blend the delectable mocha with harmonising shades of latte, caramel, and ivory to craft a traditional, relaxing palette, adding ornaments and furnishings in an array of alike tones.

products.title: Faux Suede, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A neutral combination of soft oatmeal and gentle, suede-feel fabric, the faux suede in natural is stylish and unobtrusive, perfect for offsetting against stronger shades to temper the mood in any home. The light, neutral tone of the natural makes it a versatile and easy to mix into a range of decor schemes. It would be ideal for giving a darker room a lightening effect or for adding additional texture to a room full of different kinds of fabrics.

products.title: Faux Suede, Bottle Green - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede bottle green is a lightweight and easy-to-use roman blind consisting of a the darkest of forest greens and a gorgeously touchable suede-feel fabric. This deep shade is sure to add a moody, mysterious feel to any room in the home. The softness of the cloth soothes the darkness of the bottle green's colour, making it perfect for a cosy and warm living room. Team with dark or medium woods, with rustic finishes, and gentle fawns and oatmeals to tame the heavy ambience.

products.title: Faux Suede, Pastel Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: The suede feel is a must for anyone looking to for softness, luxury, and versatility. This is exactly what the faux suede collection offers, and with the pastel pink edition, you also get a pretty, kitsch colouring to invoke a light and airy feel to any room. The sweet pastel pink will work well when contrasted with bolder, deeper shades in coordinating colours, such as aubergine, fuschia, or tropical pink.

products.title: Faux Suede, Cornflower - Roman Blind
products.description: Are you looking for a dark and rich blue that doesn't overpower the room? Then the pretty and subtle faux suede cornflower could be the blind for you, with its beautifully lightweight cloth and irresistible texture that form a gorgeous and stylish window covering. Perfectly suited to rooms with white and neutral colourings, the cornflower will stand out and shine. Go for stark white walls and furniture, with distressed white floorboards, throwing in the occasional fabric in taupe or fawn to create a rustically nautical style.

products.title: Faux Suede, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: With the faux suede in red, you're getting more than an attractive, pillarbox red blind; its soft and touchable fabric, with the feel of true suede, provides warmth and cosiness to go with its bold colour, making it hang effortlessly in any snug home. The red's versatility means that it can be used in both modern and traditional homes. Try combining it with pale taupe or dark oatmeal walls for a warm and inviting feel in your living room.

products.title: Faux Suede, White - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in white takes a lightweight, suede-feel cloth and covers it with a sea of pure white, making for an icy cool blind that gets its warmth from its soft texture. This supple fabric will fold easily into the pleated curves of the roman, leaving a dreamy and wistful ambience. The white offers a beautifully clean aesthetic, making it the perfect base from which to add brighteror darker hues with plenty of personality.

products.title: Faux Suede, Parchment - Roman Blind
products.description: Establish a sophisticated dcor scheme with the faux suede in parchment, where a sumptuous and velvety cloth creates a modern roman blind with a divine texture, all in a modish cream tone for a simple yet elegant look in your home. Combine the lavish cream hue of the parchment with neutral tones of latte, biscuit, and taupe to add warmth and depth, or golden shades for a touch of luxe. Be sure to include opulently embroidered fabrics and cosy textures for a welcoming feel in an otherwise grand scheme.

products.title: Devonshire, Terracotta - Roman Blind
products.description: Give a warm and welcoming lift to any surrounding by featuring the devonshire in terracotta in your window, where subtle burnt orange and flame red threads fuse to create a distinctive blind with alluring texture and an eye-catching, washed country finish. Mingle the terracotta with heavy tweed and rustic wools to create a comforting look with a country-inspired edge. Match the warming shade of the blind with fabrics in sunny shades of orange, medium woods, and complementary accessories for a continued theme across the space.

products.title: Devonshire, Mocha - Roman Blind
products.description: Dress your windows to impress with the devonshire in mocha. Featuring a rich and comforting shade and crafted from gently woven threads, this relaxed blind has with delicate texture, and offers effortless style and a warm and inviting finish. Layer the mocha with lavish linens to create a contrasting window display in your dining room, incorporating soothing tones of caramel and biscuit to enhance the rich brown shade.

products.title: Devonshire, Mink - Roman Blind
products.description: The rich tone of the devonshire in mink is formed from a blend of cream, fawn, and taupe threads to create a casual blind with an eye-catching shade and touchable texture that will match with a range of decor schemes in any room in the home. Combine the mink with rustic tweeds and country checks to create a comforting feel with contrasting textures, blending the chic scheme with warming caramel, ivory, and even golden fabrics for a elegant twist to a country influenced haven.

products.title: Devonshire, Forest - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the distinctive and unique devonshire in forrest within your home for an eye-catching blind that offers appealing colour. Featuring a subtle blend of mint and lagoon greens, with just the tiniest hint of blue, this blind adds an opulent finish to a relaxed and graceful cloth. Layer the forrest with similarly textured fabrics for a rich and captivating window display in your guest bedroom, incorporating layers of linen in harmonising hues for contrasting textures and utmost sophistication.

products.title: Lewis, Mustard - Roman Blind
products.description: Rustic and traditional, the lewis in mustard nonetheless manages to be bang on trend, blending soft natural shades with a subtle mustard yellow to create a gorgeously hued blind that you'll be hard pushed not to find a place for. Perhaps your kitchen could do with a little country chic? The tones are fresh and light, allowing you to blend with cream units and duck egg tiling. Accent with natural woods and the occasional splash of matching yellow for a coherent and coordinated effect.

products.title: Cellular Concrete Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Rain Forest, Lagoon - Roman Blind
products.description: In the gorgeously rich rainforest lagoon, birds, animals, flowers, and leaves sit proudly on what can only be described as a jungle green base, which allows the other colours to pop in a delightfully bold manner. Do your kids love all kinds of creatures, big and small? Then they might just fall in love with the lagoon. It would, after all, make the perfect addition to a rainforest-themed bedroom or playroom, and offers a whole host of wonderful colours to choose from when it comes to decorating the rest of the room.

products.title: Kalm Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit kalm wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any anthraciteupvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

products.title: Polar Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit polar wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Gingerbread
products.description: The gorgeous brown, earthy tones of the day & night brushed gingerbread roller blind make this a stylish, premium, and practical addition to any home. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, it will not fail to enhance your window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Molasses
products.description: The deep, rich brown of the day & night brushed molasses roller blind makes it a stylish choice, perfect if youre going for a dark and mysterious interior. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Cream
products.description: With its mid-cream colour, the day & night woven cream roller blind is perfect for a more neutral interior style, and pairs with other cream furnishings to offer a coherent look. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Wicker
products.description: With its golden brown tones, the day & night woven wicker roller blind is a stylish and practical shade. Raffia-brown can be well paired with many colours and has a relaxed feel that works well in bohemian or retro interiors. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Driftwood
products.description: The day & night brushed driftwood roller blind features an intricate black and white textured pattern that really makes this blind both stylish and practical. The monochrome colour scheme also makes it easy to style. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Real Wood Rich Coffee Bean Perfect Fit
products.description: The rich coffee bean perfect fit is a rich chocolate colour and is one of the darkest woods in their range. This blind works well in any decor due to its warm and soft nature, pairing well with mahogany furnishings. As with all their real wood perfect fits, a matching real wood venetian blind is available for a coordinated finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Cedar Perfect Fit
products.description: The golden shade of this cedar perfect fit will bring warmth to any room. The mid-brown honey hue lends itself to any interior, whether it be a companion to those neutral or to balance those stand-out brights. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

Their real wood perfect fits are designed to match their real wood venetian blinds, for a coordinated finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The venetian slats will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? products.description: The lightbox white is the whitest option for the wooden venetian blinds, ideally placed in kitchens or living rooms to make the most impact. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? products.title: Real Wood Thunderstorm Perfect Fit
products.description: Pair this timeless grey perfect fit with a monochrome decor, or use to balance a colourful space. Stylish until the last, this slat has a matt painted finish, with the real woodgrain gently visible through the stain. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? products.description: Clipping neatly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required choose perfect fit blinds with brushed alloy slats for a sleek and streamlined look that suits most conservatories and interiors.

The darker grey tone is great for adding an industrial look to your windows and gives a super stylish and professional looking blind in your window, especially paired with the anthracite frame struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Choose sage leaf satin for a fresh shade with a mid-gloss finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? products.title: Goose Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Goose satin offers a muted grey with a subtle mid-gloss finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? products.title: Chateau Blockout Mocha Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their mocha colour - a warm, rich dark toned brown perfect to complement walnut furniture or other natural wood tones in your rooms.

products.title: Cellular Blackout Concrete Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Hive Lusso Ice Perfect Fit
products.description: Hivelusso ice white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The hive lusso range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive lusso ice white perfect fit pleated blind px80201.

products.title: Como, Cherry - Roman Blind
products.description: The sweet, dotty blossoms of the como cherry have a gorgeously watercolour effect to them, only emphasised by the rich red shade that stands out against the soft charcoal grey and rich cream it sits against. The cherry would work perfectly for adding a bold, yet not overwhelming, burst of colour to an otherwise neutral or white bathroom, cloakroom, or utility room. Keep the walls light and unobtrusive, accenting with the occasional matching red and grey for added depth and character.

products.title: Como, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: When it comes to florals, the como range gets it right. And the indigo offers a deep shade of blue alongside a beautiful blue grey, resulting in a gorgeously moody canvas that combines both the classic and the contemporary. Use the indigo alongside navy blues and creams, in perhaps a main or guest bedroom, where you can complement these lovely florals with plush bedding and ornaments. Add in an accenting shade of yellow for some extra depth, vibrancy, and personality.
